events.message: I received my order last week but the product is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund for the purchase.
The issue has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back.
An agent has been assigned to the case to handle the refund request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting customer support. I understand you'd like to request a refund. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so we can process your request quickly?
My order number is 123456789. The product arrived damaged and does not work as described, so I want a full refund.
We apologize for the inconvenience. I have initiated the refund process and you should receive the money back within 5 business days.
Thank you for the quick response and refund initiation. I appreciate your help resolving this issue.
The refund request has been successfully processed and the case is now resolved from our side.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case now as the refund has been completed and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
